full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 140 of 262 1851 LC8Cmax5 Rodgers - direct Q. Are there a number of other passengers on this flight? A. Yes. Q. I'd like to go to the very next flight, please, 1106. Would you walk us through the date of that flight, please. A. It's May the 5th, 1998. Q. Where are you flying from and to? A. Teterboro, New Jersey, to Bedford, Massachusetts. Q. And is Jeffrey Epstein a passenger on this flight? A. Yes. Q. Is there one other passenger on this flight? A. Yes. Q. I'd like to go now, please, back to page 40. I'd like to direct your attention to flight number 818. Can you tell us the date of this flight. A. This is March the 29th, 1996. Q. Where are you flying from and to? A. Van Nuys, California, to Santa Fe, New Mexico. Q. And who is the only passenger on this flight? A. Jeffrey Epstein. Q. What is the number of the very next flight after 818? A. 821. Q. Why the skip from 818 to 821? A. I'm not on that flight. Q. So for flights 819 and 820, were you piloting those next two flights? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019002
